LanguageData.RK_ApronSkirt.label: Ratkin apron skirt
LanguageData.RK_ApronSkirt.description: A simple garment adorned with an apron for daily use. Wearable by children.
LanguageData.RK_SummerDress.label: Ratkin summer dress
LanguageData.RK_SummerDress.description: A summer dress that provides good ventilation to keep cool during the heat.
LanguageData.RK_StrawHat.label: Ratkin straw hat
LanguageData.RK_StrawHat.description: A straw hat made out of hay to protect one's face from sunlight.
LanguageData.RK_Muffler.label: Ratkin muffler
LanguageData.RK_Muffler.description: A shawl worn around the neck for insulation during cold weather.
LanguageData.RK_Cardigan.label: Ratkin cardigan
LanguageData.RK_Cardigan.description: A cardigan worn in addition to clothing to provide additional protection from the cold.
LanguageData.RK_WoolenHat.label: Ratkin woolen hat
LanguageData.RK_WoolenHat.description: A woolen hat to keep one's head warm.
LanguageData.RK_CrossBack.label: cross back
LanguageData.RK_CrossBack.description: A simple bag to allow one to carry a little more luggage.
LanguageData.RK_Backpack.label: Ratkin backpack
LanguageData.RK_Backpack.description: A backpack to allow one to carry more luggage.
LanguageData.RK_WorkerWear.label: Ratkin worker wear
LanguageData.RK_WorkerWear.description: Easy to wear clothing designed for all manner of work in everyday life.
LanguageData.RK_Coif.label: Ratkin coif
LanguageData.RK_Coif.description: A cap to used to prevent hair from falling over when working.
LanguageData.RK_ResearchGown.label: Ratkin research gown
LanguageData.RK_ResearchGown.description: Clothing worn during research to prevent contamination. Provides protection from minor spills.
LanguageData.RK_ResearchGlasses.label: Ratkin glasses
LanguageData.RK_ResearchGlasses.description: Glasses for Ratkin. This compensates for the usual poor eyesight of Ratkin to help in higher intellectual pursuits and also makes them feel a little smarter.
LanguageData.RK_ExplorerWear.label: Ratkin explorer wear
LanguageData.RK_ExplorerWear.description: Clothing designed for exploration. It is easy to move in and doesn't make much noise when moving around.
LanguageData.RK_ExplorerHat.label: Ratkin explorer hat
LanguageData.RK_ExplorerHat.description: A hat worn by explorers to protect their face from sunlight.
LanguageData.RK_ChefSuit.label: Ratkin chef suit
LanguageData.RK_ChefSuit.description: Chef dress designed for use in a kitchen to help cook a little faster and decrease the chances of food contamination.
LanguageData.RK_ChefHat.label: Ratkin chef hat
LanguageData.RK_ChefHat.description: Chef hat worn to prevent hair from contaminating food.
LanguageData.RK_GaurdenUniform.label: Ratkin Guardener uniform
LanguageData.RK_GaurdenUniform.description: The Guardener uniform. Worn by those tasked with the important role of "guarding the garden" in Ratkin Society. Only Ratkin with the most skill in both combat can become a Guardener. Wearable by children.
LanguageData.RK_WinterRobe.label: Ratkin winter robe
LanguageData.RK_WinterRobe.description: A winter robe worn in addition to clothes to keep warm in the coldest environments. Wearable by children.
LanguageData.RK_OutdoorBackpack.label: Ratkin outdoor backpack
LanguageData.RK_OutdoorBackpack.description: A backpack for outdoor activities. Allows one to carry heavier loads without being encumbered.
LanguageData.RK_OrderUniform.label: Ratkin order uniform
LanguageData.RK_OrderUniform.description: A modern combat uniform. It gives the wearer confidence and grit so that they can endure a little more pain. Wearable by children.
LanguageData.RK_BulletProofHelmet.label: Ratkin military helmet
LanguageData.RK_BulletProofHelmet.description: A helmet designed for Ratkin in modern combat. The additional head protection helps reduce the fear of the wearer resulting in better aim. Wearable by children.
LanguageData.RK_FlatColorCoat.label: Ratkin flatcolor coat
LanguageData.RK_FlatColorCoat.description: A sweet, monochrome dress. Comfortable and luxurious.
LanguageData.RK_FrillOnepiece.label: Ratkin frill onepiece
LanguageData.RK_FrillOnepiece.description: A cute one-piece dress with frilly decorations popular with upper class ladies.
LanguageData.RK_HairCorsage.label: Ratkin hair corsage
LanguageData.RK_HairCorsage.description: A rose-shaped corsage made from fabric.
LanguageData.RK_RibbonHairBand.label: Ratkin ribbon hair band
LanguageData.RK_RibbonHairBand.description: A cute little ribbon worn on top of one's head.
LanguageData.RK_SistersDress.label: Ratkin nun dress
LanguageData.RK_SistersDress.description: A simple dress worn by nuns. The skirt is cut lengthwise on one side for ease of movement. Wearable by children.
LanguageData.RK_SistersVeil.label: Ratkin veil
LanguageData.RK_SistersVeil.description: A veil worn by nuns. It keeps hair neat.
LanguageData.RK_EarCostume.label: Ratkin ear costume
LanguageData.RK_EarCostume.description: An ear costume that imitate the ears of Ratkin. Large ears are viewed favourably in Ratkin society. It is not cute at all when used by baseliners.
LanguageData.RK_Sack.label: Ratkin sack
LanguageData.RK_Sack.description: A large sack for carrying many things. Popular among thieves.
LanguageData.RK_BattleSuit.label: ratkin battlesuit
LanguageData.RK_BattleSuit.description: A modern combat suit for assault troops. Designed to allow the wearer to operate even in extreme temperature conditions.
LanguageData.RK_Mask.label: Ratkin mask helmet
LanguageData.RK_Mask.description: A helmet with a mask. Designed for long term combat in toxic environments.
LanguageData.RK_MaskB.label: Ratkin mask helmet
LanguageData.RK_MaskB.description: A helmet with a mask. Designed for long term combat in toxic environments.
LanguageData.RK_HeadBand.label: Ratkin head band
LanguageData.RK_HeadBand.description: A red hairband worn by fearless fanatical Ratkin.
LanguageData.RK_Plate.label: ratkin plate armor
LanguageData.RK_Plate.description: Plate armor consisting of overlapping plates which allows for greater defense.
LanguageData.RK_PlateHelmA.label: Ratkin plate helm A
LanguageData.RK_PlateHelmA.description: A helmet made of metal that offers good head protection but has poor visibility.
LanguageData.RK_PlateHelmB.label: Ratkin plate helm B
LanguageData.RK_PlateHelmB.description: A helmet made of metal that offers good head protection. Provides better visibility at the expense of leaving the face unarmored.
LanguageData.RK_PlateHelmC.label: Ratkin plate helm C
LanguageData.RK_PlateHelmC.description: A bucket helmet made of metal that offers good head protection but has poor visibility.
LanguageData.RK_WoodenShield.label: ratkin wooden Shield
LanguageData.RK_WoodenShield.description: A round shield made of wood used to deflect attacks from the front. Deflection chance is based on wearer's melee skill and material.
LanguageData.RK_HeavyShield.label: ratkin heavy Shield
LanguageData.RK_HeavyShield.description: A metal shield used to deflect attack from the front. Deflection chance is based on wearer's melee skill and material.
LanguageData.RK_HeavyShield_Big.label: ratkin Big heavy Shield
LanguageData.RK_HeavyShield_Big.description: A large metal shield used to deflect attack from the front. Deflection chance is based on wearer's melee skill and material.
LanguageData.RK_SantaRobe.label: santa robe
LanguageData.RK_SantaRobe.description: A red robe worn to imitate "Santa", an ancient figure from old Earth known to give gifts to good Ratkin.
LanguageData.RK_SantaHat.label: santa hat
LanguageData.RK_SantaHat.description: A red pointed hat worn to imitate "Santa", an ancient figure from old Earth known to give gifts to good Ratkin.
LanguageData.RK_SantaSack.label: santa package
LanguageData.RK_SantaSack.description: A large sack capable of carrying many gifts.
LanguageData.RK_WhiteCoat.label: white coat
LanguageData.RK_WhiteCoat.description: A pure white coat made out of quality fabric and carefully finished worn by Ratkin of high-ranking positions.
LanguageData.RK_RoyalRobe.label: royal robe
LanguageData.RK_RoyalRobe.description: A long flowing robe embroidered with complex decorative designs. Wildly impractical, its purpose is to mark the wearer as a powerful noble.
LanguageData.RK_RoyalCrown.label: Ratkin royal crown
LanguageData.RK_RoyalCrown.description: A grand crown of metal with an elaborate design. Worn by upper-ranking nobles.
LanguageData.RK_RottiHat.label: Rotti Hat
LanguageData.RK_RottiHat.description: It is a Rotti doll made of cloth. You can carry it around, but it's even more cute when you put it on your head!
